page.title: 06The Local Vicar.
page.content: The vicar of Shedfield, Mr.G.Morrell, is also Rural Dean of Shedfield and Curdridge. He has been a vicar for 15 years and trained at London University where he studied Theology for 3 years. He trained for the priesthood at St. Boniface College, Warminster. His training continued for the first 3 years of being a vicar. The 39 yr. Mr. Morrell has been married for 15 yrs. & has 3 children. Before he became vicar of Shedfield he spent a year in Kenya and 7 years in Havant. He thinks that God doesn't work like a telephone but he senses that God has a part in his life, like guiding him in his mind to make the right decisions. He finds his work hard to cope with at times because he has to use a kidney machine twice weekly.
